summary: Request to add `Patched()` and `DeprecatePatch()` APIs to the PHP SDK for versioning support, following the implementation pattern from Core. Potentially deprecate the existing `GetVersion` API in favor of these new methods.
userImpact: Users will have new APIs to manage workflow code evolution and versioning across SDK versions more effectively.
proposedFix: Implement `Patched(patchId, memoized): boolean` and `DeprecatePatch(patchId, memoized): boolean` APIs following Core's implementation pattern.
keyQuote: Add the `Patched(patchId, memoized): boolean` and `DeprecatePatch(patchId, memoized): boolean` APIs
